name: Onem 250/250 mg injection
description: Imipramine is an anti-depressant drug that comes in a tablet or capsule form to be taken orally. The medicine is used to treat depression and bedwetting in children. It is among the class of medicines called tricyclic antidepressants, and works by increasing a certain natural substance in the brain needed for normal brain functioning. They may be taken once or twice a day depending on the severity of the condition, with or without food. Please take this just as directed by your doctor to prevent the occurrence of any severe side effects.
label: medicine
